channel.title: [Pi] Should be a simple fix [Pi]
channel.description: Hey guys, so farcasting works in my server, but only if your using an ancient staff and you have a spell selected for it. If you are bridding or something and you just want to cast a spell without wielding a ancient staff, they will use the spell, then automatically run up to them, how do I fix this?

item.title: [Pi] Should be a simple fix [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

i think that if you find the ancient staff then maybe there is a code that your other staffs do not haveâ€¦Im not really sure thats just a suggestion.

Read full topic
